headline: Show HN: BudgetBuddy a new way to track spending
description:
Budget Buddy is a spending tracker that lives in your messaging app. I built this tool because I'd often download budget apps and forget or just not use their features. This application, to me, makes recording my spending easy.

This is my first project out of college and I learned a lot about hosting, CI and docker.

I would love some feedback on the code and the tool itself. The code can be found here: https://github.com/zlederman/budgetBuddy.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 预算宝典》是追踪支出的新方法
